nodes.text: The Praji Estate was an estate on the planet Coruscant, that was owned by the Praji family.

The estate was located near to the Bank of the Core Plaza. It contained thousands of offices for employees of the Praji family and was surrounded by a park that was large enough to land a Venator-class Star Destroyer on. The park was maintained by a group of Ho'Din gardners.

The Estate was established during the time of the Galactic Republic, after the Prajii left their homeworld Kaikielius and relocated to Coruscant. During the Yuuzhan Vong War, Coruscant was captured by the Yuuzhan Vong and the estate was destroyed when they terraformed the planet.
